statements: SELECT id, data_value, date, category FROM DataAnalysisTable ORDER BY data_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE category='Science';
SELECT id, date FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE data_value > 100 AND category='Math';
SELECT category, data_value FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM DataAnalysisTable;
SELECT * FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE category='A' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, category, date FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY data_value ASC;
SELECT id, data_value AS value, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE category='B' AND data_value BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE category IS NULL;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS count FROM DataAnalysisTable WHERE category IS NOT NULL GROUP BY category ORDER BY count DESC, category ASC;
SELECT * FROM Dataset;
SELECT id, name FROM Dataset ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description FROM Dataset WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Dataset WHERE name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT date_created FROM Dataset WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, name, description FROM Dataset WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Dataset WHERE date_created > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, description, date_created FROM Dataset ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, analysis_type, result_info FROM Dataset JOIN AnalysisResults ON Dataset.id = AnalysisResults.result_id;
SELECT id, name, description, date_created FROM Dataset WHERE name LIKE '%data%';
SELECT * FROM dataset ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, date_col FROM dataset WHERE id = 3;
SELECT result_id, analysis_name FROM analysis_results ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT insight_id, insight_description, insight_date FROM data_insights WHERE insight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM dataset JOIN analysis_results ON dataset.id = analysis_results.result_id;
SELECT * FROM dataset WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dataset ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, date_col FROM dataset WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE result_value > 0.5 ORDER BY result_value DESC;
SELECT insight_id, insight_description FROM data_insights WHERE insight_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM large_dataset;
SELECT name, salary FROM large_dataset WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY salary DESC;
SELECT id, query, result FROM data_insights WHERE id = 5;
SELECT description, value FROM analysis_results WHERE value >= 1000;
SELECT source_name, size FROM data_sources WHERE location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT id, name, age FROM large_dataset WHERE salary > 5000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT source_name, location FROM data_sources WHERE size > 1000 ORDER BY size ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, query, result FROM data_insights WHERE id IN (SELECT insight_id FROM analysis_results WHERE value > 100) ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, description, value FROM analysis_results WHERE insight_id = 3 AND value BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM large_dataset WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND age < 30 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM dataset;
SELECT data_name, data_value FROM dataset WHERE data_type = 'numeric';
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_result FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'regression' AND analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT query_text, query_time FROM data_queries WHERE query_time > '2022-01-01' AND query_result LIKE '%success%';
SELECT * FROM dataset ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT data_name, data_type, data_value FROM dataset WHERE data_type = 'Numeric';
SELECT source_name, source_description FROM data_sources WHERE source_type = 'External';
SELECT analysis_name, analysis_type, analysis_result FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT query_text, query_time FROM data_queries WHERE query_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
